Bento Sushi is hiring Sushi Food Prep Teammates in New Jersey! 

We offer group health benefits (for eligible teammates); opportunities for growth and skill building (we look forward to training you and teaching you the Bento secrets!); and fun events with your fellow coworkers, to name a few perks. We are also proud of our Bento Sushi Foundation which offers educational grants for our teammates and funding for other rewarding causes such as seafood sustainability and community involvement.

Please send your resume to careers@bentosushi.com or call 905-513-3873.

For more information, please visit our website at www.bentosushi.com
